about_the_game:
Break in by night, live by day!

In this pixel-art stealth game, you take the role of a cunning thief—or at least, that's what some might call you. Break into houses, evade the security and steal precious items. Navigate your way around the village until you have collected enough wealth and wisdom, all while unlocking different areas, discovering new houses and meeting new characters along the way!

During the night, loot the neighborhood!

Break into houses, outsmart guards, and stay one step ahead of security at all costs. Use a variety of potions and clever gadgets to navigate traps and slip past even the toughest defenses. Collect valuable items and make your daring escape before you get noticed!

During the day, embrace the village life!

Get to know the villagers, explore the market, join the excitement of the carnival, and much more. Wander through the surrounding wilderness to uncover its hidden beauty and secrets. Trade and sell your loot to earn resources and unlock new areas to explore.

With so much to do, every day is a chance to prepare for the challenges ahead and ensure you're ready for your next daring heist under the cover of night!
